name: Slitterhead (kna)
description:
DO NOT PLAY FULL SCREEN IT BREAKS THE BUTTONS AND HEARTS.
a very simple project to practice some unity basics!
it looks ugly, but i will improve it if i reunite enough energy on the future, to make it prettier.
:)
i made the sound that 's why it sounds so bad!
i used  ablenton demo to make the little ones sing, its suppossed to sound in a proper scale. the ones of the left are only pitch variations of unity. the yellow one is a base sound.
Perhaps i may add some other creatures/sounds in the future! like a radio with beats, some maraccas,etc. maybe a cute cave bacground!
try to have fun! <3
:'3
